# Jimena Del Pozo  
### MBA Candidate | Healthcare Business Leader | Strategic Innovator

---

## Welcome

Welcome to my professional MBA portfolio. I am a certified dietitian with over ten years of experience managing multidisciplinary healthcare clinics and hospitals in Peru, with deep understang of human health and behaviour. Currently living in Canada, I am pursuing an MBA with a focus on strategy, innovation, and digital transformation, expanding my impact by learning how to scale sustainable wellness solution through business innnovation.

This portfolio showcases my academic journey, full educational background, professional experience, certifications and skills, and projects that reflect my leadership, adaptability, and business insight across cultures.

---

## Mission

My mission is to integrate healthcare and nutrition with businesses through data-driven strategies and innovative tools to improve the quality of patient care, logistics operations, and service delivery. I believe in combining compassion with analytics to develop more people-focused solutions.
